mods.abstract: Architectural -- log building, reconstructed in 1970s (after extensive archeological research) to replace deteriorated field school built in 1794
Historical -- Sam Houston taught here in 1812 before moving on to military and political careers
mods.note: This structure appears on the National Historical Registry.
Ownership: State; Current Use: State historic site, including the schoolhouse, a museum and gift shop, a pavilion
Address: 3650 Old Sam Houston School Rd.

hierarchicalGeographic.citySection: Street: 3650 Old Sam Houston School Road
